title: CE60123: Ground Improvement - Quick Facts
text:
CE60123
Course name | Ground Improvement
Offered by | Civil Engineering
Credits | 3
L-T-P | 3-0-0
Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | Autumn

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Introduction, ground improvements schemes for cohesive soil sites (preloading, staged construction, accelerated consolidation with prefabricated drains, granular columns, lime columns, electro-osmosis, compaction piles, deep mixing, and vibro-replacement), ground improvement schemes for cohesionless soil sites (deep dynamic compaction, vibro-compaction, blast densification, grouting, and jet grouting), mechanically stabilized earthwork, soil nailing, ground anchors, light weight fill, and monitoring and quality control in ground improvement projects.
